text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS How about you face actual issues Americans have, like having to choose between health and income? Like the fact we aren't safe as long as #PutinOwnsTrump ? Really? Not a thing about Russia that doesn't include the word "hoax"? #COVID19 is not going to disappear. #CowardInChief
